record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="msgclass" and term=NULL and format.name="msgclass.con" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: msgclass
record.format.name: msgclass.con

brief.brief: Use this form to format the message output.
The fields available include any global variables defined when Service Manager issues the message, and all the fields in the msglog table.
Service Manager distributes this information directly to a physical configuration item rather than to some location internal to Service Manager.
The configuration item may be a printer or a disk file, as defined in the config table.

detail.detail: Class Name: Specify a valid message class name. To define this name, include it on a message panel in an application.
Connect configuration item name: Specify the configuration item in the config table to which to write this message.
Format Name: The name of the form to use to format this message.
If you do not create your own form, use the msglog form.
